You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesY Y] > &ycirc;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ycirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0176/index.htm U+00176].
  * `&ycirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0177/index.htm U+00177].
